dublin_core.dcvalue: James Powell, U-Report Global Coordinator, UNICEF, jpowell@unicef.org

U-Report is live in 23 countries: Brazil, Burkina Faso, Burundi, Cameroon, Central African Republic, Chile, Democratic Republic of Congo, Guinea, Indonesia, Ireland, Liberia, Mali, Mexico, Mozambique, Nigeria, Pakistan, Senegal, Sierra Leone, Swaziland, Uganda, Ukraine, Zambia, and Zimbabwe.
U-Report Global (ureport.in/) has a digital reach in an additional 28 countries.

U-Report is a user-centered tool that empowers young people to speak out on various issues that they care about in their community, encourage citizen-led response, and magnify voices locally, nationally, and globally to create positive change.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:29Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 u-report_se.pdf: 422335 bytes, checksum: 0c6ba41f70badbbffd2cf6690eaae3b7 (MD5)
Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, HIV/AIDS, Sexual and Reproductive Health
